attributes.action: launch a full-scale inquiry into the cost to the taxpayer of the monarchy and the royal household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently royal finances are not fully audited by the National Audit Office, despite the monarchy being funded by taxpayers' money.

The annual report on the costs of the monarchy are reported by the palace themselves, with little outside scrutiny.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "launch a full-scale inquiry into the cost to the taxpayer of the monarchy and the royal household." 

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23083

Prime Minister's Office
